name: expressjs-ops
description: A Simple ExpressJS Server (NodeJS) as a Unikernel using the Ops NanoVM framework

scripts.local:deploy: npm install; ops pkg load node_v14.2.0 -p 80 -f -n -c config.json -a index.js
scripts.aws:upload: npm install; ops image create -n -t aws --imagename expressjs-ops -c config.json --package node_v14.2.0 -a index.js
scripts.aws:deploy: ops instance create expressjs-ops -t aws -c config.json
scripts.vbox:upload: npm install; ops image create -n -t vbox --imagename expressjs-ops -c config.json --package node_v14.2.0 -a index.js
scripts.vbox:deploy: ops instance create expressjs-ops -t vbox -c config.json

author: Joshua Quek
